statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -6 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ -5 \\ 5 \\ -5 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 13 \\ -16 \\ 12 \\ -14 \\ -16 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 14 \\ -10 \\ 8 \\ -6 \\ -8 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -6 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ -5 \\ 5 \\ -5 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 13 \\ -16 \\ 12 \\ -14 \\ -16 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 14 \\ -10 \\ 8 \\ -6 \\ -8 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
